up.forgetPassword.title: Forgot password?
up.forgetPassword.content: Don't worry. Resetting your password is easy, just tell us the email address you registered
up.forgetPassword.check: Please check your spam folder, or
up.forgetPassword.send.email1: We sent a reset password email to
up.forgetPassword.send.email2: . Please click the reset password link to set your new password.
